abstract: Notes and manuscripts to enigmatic Don McLean song American Pie will be auctioned at Christie's in April.
lead_paragraph: Decades of speculation about the meaning behind of one of the 20th century’s most renowned and enigmatic songs could finally end.

headline.main: Auction May Reveal Secrets of ‘American Pie’
headline.print_headline: Auction May Reveal Secrets of ‘American Pie’

snippet: Decades of speculation about the meaning behind of one of the 20th century’s most renowned and enigmatic songs could finally end.
